Description:
Convenience Plus!
Situated on a no-through road and within walking distance to Croydon North shopping centre, this fantastic single level townhouse is ready for you to enjoy. Freshly painted throughout, the low maintenance home is perfect for first home buyers, investors or downsizers. Offering two generous sized bedrooms, ensuite-effect bathroom, spacious kitchen and two separate living areas, all you need to do is move straight in or rent out. Ducted heating and split system air conditioning provide year-round comfort. The home is located in a quiet, well maintained complex and is just a few minutes’ drive to Chirnside Park Shopping Centre, Croydon Shopping Centre and railway station. Arrange your inspection today and be impressed!
Photo ID required at all inspections.

Description:
A Distinguished Family Entertainer
Featuring an array of family-style living spaces, this beautiful home is ideally located within one of Croydon North's most sought-after streets. Backing onto Hochkins Ridge Reserve, the home is perfectly sited on a low-maintenance 738sqm (approx) block and receives brilliant light inside and out. Huge entertainment spaces include a formal lounge and dining area and a separate family room which all enjoy garden views, plus there's a premier outdoor entertaining zone. Back inside, a downstairs rumpus room can be used as a teenagers' retreat or dual living accommodation featuring a bedroom with its own ensuite. In total, there are four robed bedrooms plus a study, two bedrooms boast full ensuites and there's an additional central bathroom.
Features:
*4 zoned living areas & a large private rear yard
*Covered side deck complete with a 6-seater spa
*Ducted heating & evaporative cooling throughout
*Remote double lock up garage, shed & storage
*Close to Yarra Valley Grammar & Luther College
*Access to buses, shops & the Eastern Freeway

Description:
AWESOME LIVING FOR THE FAMILY
Beautifully positioned in the bowl of a prestige court and with a walking track behind, this family home has been thoroughly renovated. That means there's loads of space for entertaining, and the designer kitchen… wow! There's also dining room/study and meals area as well as fabulous accommodation along with a renovated ensuite. The highlights continue with a wealth of premium extras as well as a covered deck and lower level deck and a nice big block. To make it complete there is a remote double garage and the Village School, Luther College and Yarra Valley Grammar all close by.

Address: 6 SILVER BIRCH CLOSE CROYDON NORTH VIC 3136
Description:
A Family Paradise
AVAILABLE TO INSPECT this week
Saturday 21st February, 2015 at 2.30pm till 3.00pm
This magnificent Georgian style home in the ever popular Croydon North housing estate is a true family haven that has resort style living making it a paradise to enjoy all year round.
Perfectly positioned in the bowl of a quiet court the home offers you space and comfort to spread out and enjoy the family friendly floor plan that consists of 4 very good sized robed bedrooms upstairs, the main is complimented by a full ensuite with double basins and large walk in robe. Downstairs the study or home office could also be used as a 5th bedroom if needed.
The 4 spacious living areas flow beautifully through the home starting with the formal lounge and dining at the front that takes in views to the gardens and will surely be the place Mum & Dad choose to chill out with some quiet time away from the children. The real hub of the home for everyday living is the family meals area adjacent to the kitchen and overlooking the pool and BBQ area. The large rumpus room with crackling open fire will be the spot for the children to call their own or you may wish to use it as a games room or theatre room.
The stunning gourmet kitchen will be the chef of the families dream coming complete with stone bench tops, quality stainless steel appliances and Asko dishwasher to ensure they make their kitchen rule what ever the meal occasion.
Before we take in the outdoors we mustn't forget other internal features which include gas ducted heating, reverse cycle heating and refrigerated air conditioning, split system air conditioning, open fire place, ceiling fans in all bedrooms, main bathroom upstairs with spa bath and double basins, powder room downstairs, ducted vacuum, new carpets through all bedrooms, floating timber floors, valet intercom and freshly painted in light neutral colours.
Don't worry about booking another holiday to the Gold Coast or an Island retreat as you'll discover you can holiday at home everyday of the year in this sensational entertaining zone. The centre of attention is the magnificent in ground solar heated pool that is complete with your very own water slide plus heaps of room around the outside for you to kick back, relax and soak up the sun as you sip on a cool drink listening to the kids laugh and play safely under your gaze.
Outside eating and drinking is made easy with the built in gas mains BBQ and fridge allowing you to entertain with family and friends for intimate or large gatherings, parties, a place for a cool afternoon drink or a leisurely weekend breakfast with a coffee and the paper.
Car accommodation is well taken care of in the extra large double garage, complete with remote controlled door plus extra space at the back for the storage of a small boat, trailer, motorbikes or simply make it a workshop. There is added convenience and security with internal access to the home for the easy unloading of children and groceries.
All this is within a short distance to respected schools like Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar, Croydon Hills and Yarra Road Primary schools, Shopping centres, restaurants, cafes, walking tracks, parkland's and all other amenities you would need.
Paradise found will start with your viewing today.

Description:
QUIETLY SPEAKS OF ELEGANT LUXURY
This is it! Your dream home, a gorgeous 2 storey 5 bedroom brick home with the most generous living spaces. Entry through double front doors to an attractively tiled foyer. To the left is the expansive formal lounge. To the right a good sized office/5th bedroom. There's an expansive tiled gourmet kitchen with excellent lower and overhead storage and a useful pantry adjacent to an oversized eating area. Downstairs also features a guest powder room. The home has beautiful, quality carpets. Upstairs you'll a find really amazing space, with a retreat area, adjacent family bathroom, separate toilet and a pleasant sitting area between the master and second bedrooms. All bedrooms have large built-in robes with a walk-in and en-suite to the master. From the kitchen/meals area you enter a shady, cool covered casual entertaining area. There's a lawn area for children's play behind the double remote controlled garage that has direct entry to the house. Other features include quality drapes, ducted central heating, evaporative cooling, a secure side entry with room for a motor home, caravan or more cars. All just a minutes walk to the bus stop with buses to major shops and transport and a school bus to Norwood College. All in all this is an ideal family home that has been immaculately maintained and is handy to schools and colleges.

Description:
Stylish, Modern and Single Level
Private and secure within a modern development of only three, this eye-catching unit features a highly sought after single level layout, made all the more appealing by exceptionally spacious rooms, neutral tones and a generous rear garden.This stunning home presents as new promising its new owners, whether it be down-sizers, investors or those eager for more leisure time, a very pleasant lifestyle surrounded by quality and style.The spacious lounge/dining has an inviting air for everyday living or entertaining and the sparkling white kitchen, complemented by Blanco stainless steel appliances and adjoining family/meals area is every keen chef's dream. Of the two bedrooms the master with walk in robe has direct access to the stylish dual entry bathroom complete with bath.Sliding glass doors open to the rear garden, with plenty of room for pets and a wonderful space for those with a green thumb or to entertain alfresco on the massive 21 square metre merbau deck. Ducted heating, air conditioning and remote control single garage are included in this fabulous unit handy to shops, schools and transport.
Lee Fenech : 0410 426 400

Description:
SOLD PRIOR TO AUCTION
Built in 1921 as a holiday home, this unique country-style residence - aptly named Fairview Cottage - is a home that offers the serenity and seclusion of the country yet sits only a short distance from vital amenities. Perched high on the Croydon ridgeline and sited on 4015sqm (approx), it is positioned to capture various views of the Yarra Valley.
The exquisite interior is adorned with timber accents and showcases leafy vistas throughout whilst also incorporating a number of modern comforts. Ensuring all living and entertaining requirements are taken care of, a beautifully renovated kitchen overlooks a large living area before progressing to a lounge/dining room and out to the balcony. Strategically spread over the 2 levels, the accommodation includes 4 bedrooms plus a 5th bedroom/study option serviced by 2 bathrooms including a lavish ensuite (equipped with a clawfoot bath) to the master.
Outdoors, lush gardens encase the entire property bringing an abundance of birdlife to your doorstep. Here you'll find an array of relaxing areas to dine and grassy spaces for children and pets to enjoy.
In addition to the home's impressive list of features, you'll find it convenient to Hochkins Ridge Reserve, Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar, the Eastern Freeway and local shops including Chirnside Park.
Features:
*900mm Falcon Stove, open fireplace & drying cupboard
*Gas ducted heating, evap & split system cooling
*Dbl carport, garage & additional off-street parking
*Water tank, shed, chook pen & wood storage
*Studio, sub-floor & attic storage; WIR & BIRs
*Floorboards, carpet & tiles throughout

Description:
Family Serenity on over 1/2 acre
For country-style serenity, space and the privacy that comes with a double block, this large 2-storey, 4 bedroom plus study and 3 bathroom family residence will command your attention. Set amidst scenic gardens on approx 2180sqm in a no-through road in the Birt's Hill precinct, it backs onto Tadji bushland reserve and offers comfortable living for families and tradies, complete with 3 living zones, verdant garden outlooks and potential to personalise. A ground floor entry hallway with a high angled ceiling introduces a fitted study/5th bedroom and a private master with BIRs, treed outlook and ensuite. The secluded second bedroom (BIRs) and 2-way family bathroom are also on the ground floor. Upstairs are bedrooms 3 and 4 (both with BIRs), a rumpus/children's retreat (or 3rd living area) and the third bathroom. Enjoy wonderful versatility, from the sunken lounge (open fireplace) and formal dining area at the front, to the big timber kitchen - fitted with Miele dishwasher and quality tiled splashbacks ? and dining/meals area at the rear. The large family room is also at the rear and boasts a bar and new carpets; ideal for your gatherings. A deck, roofed barbeque area and huge picturesque garden with an oak tree, chain wire fences and own gate into the reserve, will delight the whole family. There is also a pool with equipment that could be refurbished if you wish. Appointments: secure remote double carport, off street parking, ducted heating, refrigerated ducted cooling, ducted vacuum and ample storage. Close to transport, Luther College, Croydon Hills Primary, Croydon station, Croydon North shops, Chirnside shops, reserves and EastLink.
Warren Paas : 0411 558 994

Description:
A Fantastic & Flexible Family Plan
This enchanting family home is positioned in one of Croydon North's most prized and peaceful cul-de-sacs close to Hochkins Ridge Reserve and prestigious schools including Luther College and Yarra Valley Grammar. An accommodating family abode, it boasts 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, and 3 living areas that are serviced by a classic timber kitchen and meals area. Stepping outside, you'll find the sizeable block provides ample yard space for kids and pets to enjoy, and features a fantastic undercover decked area that's ideal for alfresco dining. Substantial, sun-filled and incredibly convenient, there is little this exceptional home cannot offer.
Features:
*Polished floorboards, carpets & tiles throughout
*Roof & gutters redone 2 years ago approx.
*Gas ducted heating, coonara & evaporative cooling
*Remote double lock up garage, shed & 16 solar panels
*Close to McAdam Square shops & the Eastern Freeway
*Near to Yarra Road Primary, The Good Shepherd Primary & bus services

Description:
Class All The Way!
LAST ONE LEFT!!!
Be quick to secure your very own luxurious unit built by the reputable local Erfanian Developments team and enjoy stamp duty savings!
Now Completed! You could be celebrating with family and friends in your brand new home! These cleverly designed and landscaped three bedroom homes will be finished to perfection with quality fixtures and fittings throughout. With location/location being on every buyers list these properties are conveniently located only a short stroll away from Croydon North supermarket, shops, cafes and transport.
At ground level you will find the stunningly presented open plan main living and dining areas, master bedroom with en suite, stylish kitchen with stainless steel appliances, including a 900mm gas cook top, Caesarstone bench tops and alfresco entertaining area. Upstairs is the perfect kids retreat with two bedrooms, separate toilet, modern main bathroom and private living area.
Further highlights include carpet and built in robes in all bedrooms, polished Tasmanian Oak hardwood flooring, heating and cooling, slim line water tank pumped to toilet, and double remote lock up garage.

Description:
UNDER OFFER- OPEN FOR INSPECTION CANCELLED
Why not welcome in the New Year with this great buy?! A well-presented & affordable 3 bedroom home situated in a sought after pocket of Croydon North, surrounded by parkland and walking tracks this home is perfect for an owner occupier, a savvy investor or the ideal entertainer! With a great rental track record and a secure tenant in place this property is not to be missed!
As soon as you walk through the front door the home offers a welcoming feel with an abundance of light and space. Multiple living zones create a flexible floor plan that is sure to suit any family mixing open plan with traditional space. The master bedroom is an impressive 6.7 metres and boasts a large walk in robe, ensuite and private fernery. You will find the well equipped kitchen overlooking the family, dining and large covered alfresco areas making it perfect for entertaining. Situated on a low maintenance block with some of the best parks and walking tracks at your doorstep this brilliant location is topped off by being surrounded by some of Melbourne's premiere schools including Yarra Road Primary, Yarra Valley Grammar and Luther College. With easy access to Eastland and Eastlink call today for an inspection.
Features: Gas cooking, dishwasher, split-system, ducted heating, double lock up garage with internal access and remote, built in robes in all bed rooms, an impressive master bedroom and a low maintenance yard.
David van den Bovenkamp : 0425 806 460

Description:
RELAX IN STYLE, COMFORT & CLASS
* UNDER CONTRACT *
An immaculate transformation has brought this beautifully appointed 3 bedroom (plus study) home to a point of perfection. Filled with natural sunlight with a leafy green backdrop beyond a large backyard, the complete refurbishment is the star attraction, providing a new beginning for buyers from all walks of life, including young families, busy families, retirees and even investors. Set in a no-through road in the exclusive Birts Hill precinct the tri-level floorplan creates immediate interest, featuring the master bedroom with en suite and walk in robe, a powder room adjoining the laundry, as well as the main bathroom taking the space on the entry level. A few steps up and there's another 2 robed bedrooms and a study. Head in the other direction and this is the main attraction where all your living and entertaining will take place. Hosted by modern Caesarstone kitchen, the main living and dining area is completed by a sunny deck area with pleasant views to bush land setting and a walking track. Completed by a lengthy list of extras which include ducted heating, split system cooling, plenty of storage and a double carport, the property is also at the beck and call of some of the area's best schooling options, whilst having walking access to McAdam Square shopping Centre and to bus services.

Description:
Under Offer/Under Contract
UNDER OFFER. Positioned on an attractive corner allotment just a short walk from the Croydon North shops, this weatherboard cutie offers easy single level living with great convenience. A wide front veranda provides a warm welcome and leads to the well-presented interior featuring high ceilings and classic style. Accommodation includes a good-sized lounge/dining with lovely leafy aspect, adjoining kitchen/meals zone with gas cooker, 2 robed bedrooms (master with adjoining study/nursery room), central bathroom, and practical full sized laundry. Outside, the covered and paved BBQ zone is private and inviting, while a sunny gravel courtyard provides an attractive second outdoor option, with the pretty veranda as the icing on the cake. Additional features include gas heating, air conditioner, garden shed, carport, and extra off-street parking. Walk to shops, schools, parklands and bus stop, with Chirnside Park and Eastland shopping centres, Eastlink and train station just a short drive away.

Description:
Under Offer/Under Contract
This split level family home is set amongst a tranquil established garden with superb views from almost every window. The two separate living and sleeping zones make this a practical family home, cleverly positioning the study (perfect for a home business) and master bedroom (with walk-in robe and ensuite) at the front of the home, while 2 further robed bedrooms are placed at the rear of the home. The kitchen/meals area has the advantage of access to the covered upper deck/BBQ area - expanding your living zone via glass sliding doors, while further accommodation includes a spacious lounge/dining, family bathroom, and large rumpus with fitted bar and access onto the lower rear deck. Additional features include stainless steel oven, 6-burner gas cooking, large laundry, ample storage, ducted heating, air conditioners, double garage and huge under house workshop/storage perfect for a home business or handy man. Close to Yarra Valley Grammar, Luther College, primary schools, parklands, shops and transport - inspection is bound to impress.

Description:
Spacious Family Home, Spectacular Views
Made for large or expanding families, this astoundingly spacious 12 year old abode boasts a highly versatile design. Set over three incredible levels with 40sqs (approx) of living space, the layout caters for entertaining, recreation and the demands of every day life.
The entry level incorporates a formal lounge/dining area and a rumpus as well as an open family and meals area easily served by a well-equipped kitchen boasting breathtaking views. A study, one bedroom and one bathroom are also zoned to this level. Stairs descend to a further two bedrooms which share an additional bathroom while the master suite occupies the entire upper floor equipped with its own ensuite, walk-in robe and retreat. Outdoors, there are paved spaces surrounded by gorgeous leafy gardens, and a decked balcony provides tree-top views and a tranquil spot to recline.
This brilliantly conceptualised home is set high on Birt's Hill on 1372sqm (approx), close to a wide range of renowned schools, local shops and bus services.
Also features:
*Warm colour palette; Modern bathrooms
*Practical kitchen with SS appliances & WI pantry
*GDH, EVAP AC & split system AC; 20,000L water tank
*Remote double lock up garage with rear roller door
*Walk to Luther College & Good Shepherd Primary
*Close to Yarra Valley Grammar & McAdam Square

Description:
Exceptional Family Living
Situated in a family friendly quiet cul-de-sac location, this stunning home on 1093m2 (approx.), surrounded by beautiful landscaped gardens, offers the ultimate design incorporating style and comfort to suit a large or growing family. In a highly desirable pocket of Croydon North, enjoy the convenience of living close to sporting facilities, reserves and quality schooling options to cater for all ages from kindergarten through to secondary school.
With plenty of natural light and fresh neutral tones throughout, this comfortable family home offers five bedrooms all with built in robes, luxurious master with en suite and walk in wardrobe, 2nd bedroom/study and private lounge off the wide hallway, extending from the entrance to the stunning open plan kitchen/dining/family area. Three robed bedrooms are peacefully sectioned off the family room, sharing a separate toilet and bright modern bathroom.
The contemporary kitchen features stainless steel appliances including a 900mm gas cook top and dishwasher, walk in pantry and an island bench overlooking the dining and spacious family room with 6 panel glass doors bringing the natural light and stunning outdoors in. Open them out to enjoy your covered alfresco entertaining area and expansive rear yard complete with a decked swimming pool, established manicured gardens, chicken pen/run and lawn areas for children to play.
Further highlights include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, laundry with ample storage space and remote lock up garage with internal access, extra parking space for up to 8 cars down the concreted side driveway to the rear yard, New Chuango security cameras and alarm system.
Convenient to quality schools including Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar, Yarra Hills/Good Sheppard Primary and Rudolph Steiner Schools, McAdams Square speciality shopping and cafe precinct, Eastland Shopping Centre, bus services and Eastlink.

Address: 4/70 Bonnie View Road CROYDON NORTH VIC 3136
Description:
Peacefully Set Family Home
Set back peacefully at the rear of the block, this spacious home on 570m2 (approx.), surrounded by lush established gardens, has been built to comfortably accommodate your large or growing family.
Enjoy the peace and convenience of multiple living quarters off the spacious light filled family/dining room. Three robed bedrooms are serviced by the bright main bathroom, are separated from the master with walk in robe, en suite and study/5th bedroom in private wings. The kitchen with dishwasher leads to the covered balcony overlooking the private rear lawn and easy care garden.
Further highlights include air conditioning, laundry, ample storage space including a walk in linen cupboard, double and tandem access carports.
Brilliantly located within a short stroll of Croydon North Shopping and cafe precinct with easy access to schools, parks, public transport, Eastlink, Chirnside Park and Eastland shopping centres.

Description:
Potential Plus on 981 m2
Would you love to raise your family on a big block that has stunning views of the Dandenongs? Want a home that you can renovate, add your own personality to and reap the rewards? This very comfortable, light-filled retreat is privately set on about 981 m2 in a tightly-held address, close to Birts Hill Reserve, Croydon North Plaza, transport, Luther College and Primary schools. Nestled behind a high fence, you'll first notice the attractive gardens and the roofed deck which wraps three sides of the home for easy entertaining and enjoyment of the inspiring views. The interior is enhanced by high ceilings and features 3 double bedrooms (2 with BIRS), a renovated bathroom and laundry. The large lounge/dining room is a relaxing space for everyday living; it flows through to a neat open plan kitchen fitted with a Westinghouse oven and breakfast bar. Outdoors you'll find a barbeque area and plenty of private garden spaces for parents to relax and children to play. The big double garage with storage room could also double as an undercover entertaining area. Complemented by a gas wall heater and split system. Enquire now.
Donna Walpole : 0421 997 827
